Expression: lambda ptype, activity, households, persons: persons.query('ptype == %s and cdap_activity==\'%s\'' % (ptype, activity)).groupby('household_id').size().reindex(households.index).fillna(0)
lambda pemploy, activity, households, persons: persons.query('pemploy == %s and cdap_activity==\'%s\'' % (pemploy, activity)).groupby('household_id').size().reindex(households.index).fillna(0)

lambda ptype1, ptype2, activity, households, persons: persons.query('(ptype == %s or ptype == %s) and cdap_activity==\'%s\'' % (ptype1, ptype2, activity)).groupby('household_id').size().reindex(households.index).fillna(0)
